# <a name="has-symbols-supversion-badge21sup"></a>has-symbols <sup>[![Version Badge][2]][1]</sup>

[![dependency status][5]][6]
[![dev dependency status][7]][8]
[![License][license-image]][license-url]
[![Downloads][downloads-image]][downloads-url]

[![npm badge][11]][1]

حدد ما إذا كانت بيئة JS تحتوي على دعم الرمز. يدعم المواصفات، أو shams.

## <a name="example"></a>مثال

```js
var hasSymbols = require('has-symbols');

hasSymbols() === true; // if the environment has native Symbol support. Not polyfillable, not forgeable.

var hasSymbolsKinda = require('has-symbols/shams');
hasSymbolsKinda() === true; // if the environment has a Symbol sham that mostly follows the spec.
```

## <a name="supported-symbol-shams"></a>رمز shams مدعوم
 - get-own-property-symbols [npm](https://www.npmjs.com/package/get-own-property-symbols) | [github](https://github.com/WebReflection/get-own-property-symbols)
 - core-js [npm](https://www.npmjs.com/package/core-js) | [github](https://github.com/zloirock/core-js)

## <a name="tests"></a>الاختبارات
ما عليك سوى استنساخ المستودع `npm install`، وتشغيل `npm test`
